metadata.title: CVE-2019-14492 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenCV before 3.4.7 and 4.x before 4.1.1. Thereis an out of bounds read/write in the functionHaarEvaluator::OptFeature::calc in modules/objdetect/src/cascadedetect.hpp,which leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: opencv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
